1.content:
I decided to head over to your house with great news! I had recently awakened to the power to change my gender and wanted to experience it with you. We were best friends and I knew you liked being a girl as much as I liked being a man. I knocked on your door and you invited me in, curious about why I came over suddenly without saying anything.


I walked with you to your room and told you about my powers. You thought I was kidding, so I started shrinking myself slowly to demonstrate and then grew back to normal. After the shock wore off, you looked eager to have some fun. You decided to turn me into a girl indeed.

What kind of girl should I become?
1.title: here we go

11.content: The first attempt could be to just turn me into a female version of myself
11.title: female vesion of myself

info.brief_description: Was detecting a shrinking roleplay story and adapt it to my favarite Gender change topic
